version.body:
You need to add thin to your Gemfile.
gem "thin"

version.title: Rails 3 not working with thin

version.body: It seems that thin needs to be updated. "dispatcher" no longer exists. A quick fix is require "rails/dispatcher", but it's deprecated and points to the proper fix, which is to use Rails.application.
version.body-html: It seems that thin needs to be updated. "dispatcher" no longer exists. A quick fix is require "rails/dispatcher", but it's deprecated and points to the proper fix, which is to use Rails.application.
version.title: Rails 3 not working with thin

version.body:
For what it's worth you can still use thin by specifying the rackup file:
$ thin start -R config.ru
version.body-html:
For what it's worth you can still use thin by specifying the rackup file:

$ thin start -R config.ru
